website_summaries.verdict: The Huawei Mate 10 may be hard for you to get your hands on, but it’s worth the effort if you want a big-screen phone and don’t quite have the budget for a Galaxy Note, iPhone Plus or Pixel 2.
pros: Huawei’s Mate 10 gives you performance and cameras comparable to Samsung’s Galaxy Note 8 and Google’s Pixel XL 2, but for several hundred bucks less
It also has a headphone jack
cons: The phone’s battery doesn’t last as long as the Mate 10 Pro despite being the same size
Huawei’s Android software could be smoother and the phone isn’t getting an official release in the US or UK

customer_reviews.title: Omg awsome phone love ❤ it I had the nexus 6p so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Omg awsome phone love ❤ it I had the nexus 6p so I kwew by experience Huawei phone's were 100 percent reliable I had this phone up and running with all my apps transferred automatically in like 10 minutes Huge screen in a small pkg. Iphones r toys compared this baby it picks up 670 megs off my home Internet somehow , connects to my tv by hdmi without any apps just connect... everything else I wouldn't trust all other phones have some sort of problems, well I'm not spending 7 or 8 hundred bucks just to take a chance... .happy with mate 10,
customer_reviews.author: Tonys List

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone. I upgraded to this from a ZTE ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone. I upgraded to this from a ZTE Axon 7. The Axon 7 had comparable specs/hardware, but the Huawei Mate 10 honestly outperforms it in every way possible. Its a beautiful phone, and it functions incredibly well. The camera was a big selling point for me - and this delivers on what it promises. The software for the camera doesn't quite unleash the power of the name brand lenses the way it could, but wow it's a tremendous upgrade from the ZTE. Great phone, worth the $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very water proof
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know it was water proof. They day I bought it my 18 month threw it in the tub with her brother... It is still perfect. Wow. I only buy phones based on the camera and I often return them if the camera is not good after going through four phones recently I found one that will not be returned this one actually takes moving children pictures that are not blurry
customer_reviews.author: Mommom

customer_reviews.title: I love the Mate 10 this is my second Huawei phone
customer_reviews.text: I love the Mate 10 this is my second Huawei phone, I previously had the Mate 9. I am a big fan of Huawei products, I first introduced to them on business in Asia. I also have the MateBook and smartwatch -- don't believe the government hype Huawei phones, computers and smartwatches are some of the best on the market. They have every other brand playing catch up.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Askew

customer_reviews.title: Mate 10 is Rockin It!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to write product reviews, however, for the money, this phone is rocking it! Flagship phone for $580. Dual Sim, headphone jack, screen is good, in the box comes w/ everything you need - rear clear bumper case, front screen protector, charger n cable. Android 8.0. Considering cost and value, I would purchase this phone again in a heartbeat. All you need is a Sim card and you're good to go. T-mobile or ATT.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far, Lots of features and good performance. A lot of the thingsfeatures that I needed third-party apps to access on my old Samsung are included in this phone. The battery life is awesome. It has been more than two weeks and I am still exploring and discovering features.
customer_reviews.author: Glenroy George

customer_reviews.title: BEST PHONE I HAVE EVER OWNED
customer_reviews.text: I have had numerous smartphones over the years, most recently the Samsung Note 8. I'm not a fan of the phones with curved screen edges, so I decided to try the Mate 10. By far, the Mate 10 is the nicest phone I have ever owned. Very happy with this purchase... Beautiful screen, easy to use, extremely fast, and very solidly built!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone and great price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone and great price. Big screen in medium size phone, 2 SIMs, excellent camera, great resolution, two days charge, super fast. Latest Android OS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone and good condition
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, bought it in very good used condition. The phone only had a barely visible scratch on the back panel and a very tiny knick in the bottom right side of the screen. (I use a case on it so I didn't care plus I knew the condition wasn't mint) I honestly wouldn't have found them if I wasn't heavily inspecting my phone under bright light so it's fine with me. Great phone with amazing camera and battery life. The screen is also absolutely gorgeous (coming from a Mate 9 Pro with an OLED screen) and just love the feel of the device.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone Love the Leica Camera
customer_reviews.text: Fast processor Awaome Camera !!!! It come with screen protection film and a Clear soft rubber phone case.
customer_reviews.author: LadyB

customer_reviews.title: I can’t get the signal! My providers are T-mobile and China Unicom.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Many Huawei phones. But, None of them is as bad as this one. I don’t know whether or not my SIM card is incompatible with the phone, but I can’t use it since I even can’t catch the signal. Besides, I can’t open message in ordinary way. I hope those error is attributable to the delivery, not phone itself.
customer_reviews.author: Ryann

customer_reviews.title: Great Smartphone!
customer_reviews.text: Great Smartphone. Same or better than Samsung or Apple phones, at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Filippi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this purchased. Mate 10 is a great phone, no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Jonason

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent battery and latest android system. The camera and the display are simply perfect! Recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Alven A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent material quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent material quality, great pictures. Product was delivered on time and as described. Something I didn't know, the Huawei Mate 10 comes with a screen protector and cover.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Pablo Olguin

customer_reviews.title: thanks
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone. but I'm old school so it's going to take some time to get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille J Myers

customer_reviews.title: I really like my Huawei phone.
customer_reviews.text: A friend suggested this device. I am impressed with many features. This phone was a wise purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AmzCustomer

customer_reviews.title: home button no response after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I once believe it is a nice phone until the home button doesnt work. No solution at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Zhengyang Shen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Battery drains too fast don't know if is a hardware bug
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is a quality phone for use in africa too
customer_reviews.author: RONALD MAIRA

customer_reviews.title: Extreme battery life
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at the battery life on this phone. The Mate 10 is a good phone. I wish they'd made it with a bigger screen (it's only 6") but other than that, the resolution is great, the camera is good, the speakers are loud, and it's fast. I don't use my phone much for actual phone calls, mainly for a text and internet device, and for those things it is great. The Leica camera in it seems better than the Sony camera in my last phone even though the Sony was a megapixel more in resolution. And they seem to have tech support. It's worth spending the extra money for this phone.
customer_reviews.author: nazcalito

customer_reviews.title: Overall AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing, nice camera quality, fast, and it overall works great. I use the service MetroPCS and i can honestly say so far so good! Will never be coming back to Apple products AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: omar

product_meta.title: Huawei Mate 10 ALP-L29 64GB Black, Dual SIM, 5.9", Dual 20 MP +12 MP, GSM Unlocked International Model, No Warranty
product_meta.description: Color:BrownInside the box contains: Huawei Mate 10, Type-C USB cable, Earphones, Charger (may be foreign), screen protector (pre-applied), soft transparent case, Documentation.
feature_bullets: Display: 5.9 inches IPS LCD, OS: Android 8.0 (Oreo) | EMUI 8.0, Camera: Dual 20 MP +12 MP, Memory: 64 GB, 4 GB RAM | microSD, up to 256 GB (uses SIM 2 slot). Fingerprint Sensor, CPU: HUAWEI Kirin 970, Octa-Core CPU (4 x Cortex A73 2.36 GHz + 4 x Cortex A53 1.8 GHz) + i7 co-processor, Mali-G72 MP12 GPU.
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.

Please check if your GSM cellular carrier supports the bands for this model before purchasing, LTE may not be available in all countries: SIM1:FDD-LTE: Band 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 6 / 7 / 8 / 9 / 12 / 17 / 18 / 19 / 20 / 26 / 28, TD-LTE: Band 34 / 38 / 39 / 40, UMTS (WCDMA) / HSPA+ / DC-HSDPA: Band 1 / 2 / 4 / 5 / 6 / 8 / 19, TD-SCDMA: Band 34 / 39, GSM / EDGE: 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 MHz.
This device may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international items. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.
The box contains: Your new device, USB cable, Earphones, Charger (may be foreign), Documentation.
